A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 14:47 UTC.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"09:47:12 <08Notch> indev's been updated"}}</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 15:04 UTC,<ref name="WoN 0129 release">[[wordofnotch:359717446|Crafting on /indev/ now]] – The Word of Notch, January 29, 2010, 15:04 UTC</ref> by which time the [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100129-1452|next version]] had already been released.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Stick JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stick]]<ref name="0129 demo">{{ytl|OpmK7rDU5bA|archive=nlZR7_nKMaI|Crafting and Mining in Minecraft|Nizzotch|January 29, 2010, 15:41 UTC}}</ref><ref group="note" name="gameplay">This has been verified by gameplay from next version's jar dated January 29, 2010 at 14:52 UTC.</ref>'''
* Used to craft tools.
* Crafted with [[planks]].
{{Crafting table
|B2=Oak Planks
|B3=Oak Planks
|Output=Stick, 4}}

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Crafting]]'''
* Is now functional.<ref name="WoN 0129 release" /><ref name="0129 demo" />

'''[[Smelting]] '''
* Done via throwing the item into [[fire]] or [[lava]].<ref name="0129 demo" />
* Currently the four recipes are:
** Coal ore to 1-3 coal.
** Iron ore to 1-3 iron ingots.
** Gold ore to 1-3 gold ingots.
** Emerald ore to 1-3 diamonds.

=== Items ===
'''General'''
* Items now stack up to 64.<ref name="0129 demo" />
* Now get picked up quicker and do not perish in fire.

'''[[File:Arrow (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Arrow]]s'''

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Steve_(mob).png|32px]] [[File:Black_Steve.png|32px]] [[Mob (entity)|Mob]]'''
* The Rana model and texture has been replaced with a new model with two separate skins, commonly known as "Steve" and "Black Steve".

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Starting House JE1.png|40px]] [[Starting house]]'''
* Removed the [[chests]] dedicated to [[TNT]] and [[cloth]].<ref group="note" name="gameplay" />
* Removed all items from chests.<ref group="note" name="gameplay" /></onlyinclude>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[File:Hotbar.png|200px]] [[Hotbar]]'''
* The player now spawns with a [[flint and steel]].

=== General ===
'''[[Control]]s'''
* Right-clicking an inventory slot now deposits a single item from a hovering stack.<ref name="WoN 0129 release" />

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* The games performance no longer drastically degrades progressively.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Stone tools cannot be crafted.
